document.discussion_title: Georgia was thought to be an early favorite for Emory Jones
document.topic_text: Georgia was thought to be an early favorite for Emory Jones , but are the Bulldogs slipping? Ohio State and Tennessee are putting on a press that may be tough to beat. Edit
document.post: Georgia was thought to be an early favorite for Emory Jones , but are the Bulldogs slipping? Ohio State and Tennessee are putting on a press that may be tough to beat. Edit
